questions.quote: George? Are you there?  I hate that stupid message.  I know you're avoiding me, I'm at the office, please call me, I've gotta talk to you.
You think people will still be using napkins in the year two-thousand? Or is this mouth-vacuum thing for real?
And Kramer thinks a penalty stroke may have driven him to it.
So, I had what you might call a little encounter this morning.
Take a look at this. Doesn't that look like my flesh and blood? Of course, your mother-

Hey, what about this? I'm in a car accident. The motorist is uninsured, you with me?
Anyway, Cynthia and I got into this big argument afterwards and I think it's over.
Well, I had to. I had to apologize. I mean, I punched Mickey Mantle, my idol. It was eating me up inside!
Nothing to worry about, it was just a flat tire. But rest assured, we're prepared to handle anything that might come up.
